application.controller

Class KioskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.controller.KioskController

  • public class KioskController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class that handles all the events associated with the Kiosk page.

      • buttonAddToCartClicked

        public void buttonAddToCartClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Adds a specific item to the user's cart. Decrements the stock for that specific product.
        Parameters:
        event - The "Add to Cart" button is clicked.

      • buttonClearCartClicked

        public void buttonClearCartClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Clears the user's cart of all products had been added to it.
        Parameters:
        event - The "Clear Cart" button is clicked.

      • buttonBuyClicked

        public void buttonBuyClicked(javafx.event.Event event)
        Handles the event that user buys the products currently in their cart. The user's cart is cleared and the Kiosk's inventory is updated accordingly.
        Parameters:
        event - The Buy button is clicked.

      • loadProducts

        public void loadProducts(java.util.ArrayList<Product> inventory)
        Loads a specific page of products.
        Parameters:
        inventory - An ArrayList containing all products.

      • printProduct

        Provides textual representation of the inventory.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        - A String representation of all products with their corresponding information.
